info.title: BaaS Pix Payment
info.description:
BaaS Pix Payment

Setup credit order validation

- Add a valid url to *pix-credit-order-validation-url* configuration linked to the *application-id* - Follow the request/response schema pattern

Payment Occurrences

Code Description
PIX0001 Created
PIX0002 Confirmed
PIX0003 Not Confirmed
PIX0004 Rejected
PIX0005 Done
PIX0006 Cancelled
PIX0007 Insufficient balance
PIX0008 Timeout
PIX0009 Processed

Request schema

*Header* ```json { X-R4-Application: GUID // Application Unique Identifier X-R4-Delivery: GUID // Unique Payment Identifier X-R4-Event: pix_credit_order_validation User-Agent: R4-Hookshot } ``` *Body* ```json { "object_kind": pix_credit_order_validation, "object_id": "GUID", // Unique Payment Identifier "application_id": "GUID", // Application Unique Identifier "key": "56856854748", // PIX key - Only provided if not MANUAL payment "original_end_to_end_id": "E0435879820200123221500000000001, // Only provided for payment return "metadata": { "id": // Unique Payment Identifier, value: 185.99, goal: CHANGE | WITHDRAW | BUY_OR_TRANSFER, payer: { name: "JORGE SILVA", agency: 1, account_number: 1234567, account_digit: 7, account_type: "PAYMENT_ACCOUNT", document_type: "CPF", document_number: 15485625874 }, recipient: { account_id: "GUID", // Unique Recipient Account Identifier document_number: 01456258965 }, } } ```

Response schema

*Success - 200* ```json { "operation_validated_at": "2020-01-23T22:10:05.025Z" // [REQUIRED] yyyy-mm-ddTHH:mm:ss.sssZ } ``` *Error - 400* ```json { "operation_validated_at": "2020-01-23T22:10:05.025Z", // [REQUIRED] yyyy-mm-ddTHH:mm:ss.sssZ "reason": "RECIPIENT_ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND_OR_INVALID", // [REQUIRED] REASON enum "description": "Recipient account is invalid or was not found" // [OPTIONAL] (additional error description) } ``` REASON values: - RECIPIENT_PSP_ERROR - RECIPIENT_ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND_OR_INVALID - RECIPIENT_ACCOUNT_BLOCKED - RECIPIENT_ACCOUNT_CLOSED - RECIPIENT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_INVALID - RECIPIENT_TRANSACTION_TYPE_INVALID - RECIPIENT_ACCOUNT_VALUE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED - RETURN_PAYMENT_VALUE_EXCEEDED - RECIPIENT_DOCUMENT_NUMBER_DIFFERS_FROM_ACCOUNT - RECIPIENT_DOCUMENT_NUMBER_INVALID - REJECTED_BY_RECIPIENT_PARTICIPANT - REJECTED_BY_RECIPIENT_TIMEOUT - RETURN_PAYMENT_DEADLINE_EXCEEDED - PAYER_IS_SANCTIONED_BY_CSNU - PAYMENT_PROCESS_ERROR - ORIGINAL_TRANSACTION_IS_NOT_WITHDRAW_OR_CHANGE ***

Receive payment (credit order)

To receive the confirmation, its necessary the previous registration of the client url. This object will be sent as an HTTP call with the POST method, of which the client must respond with a 202 status and within 10 seconds.

Confirmation scheme

*Header* ```json { X-R4-Application: GUID // Application Unique Identifier X-R4-Delivery: GUID // Attempt Unique Identifier X-R4-Event: pix_done User-Agent: R4-Hookshot } ``` *Body* ```json { "object_kind": "pix_done" "object_id": "GUID", // Payment Unique Identifier "account_id": "GUID" // Account Unique Identifier "application_id": "GUID", // Application Unique Identifier } ``` ## Error codes Below is a list of possible error codes that can be returned: | Code | Description | |-------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------| | `ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND` | Account not found | | `APPLICATION_PRODUCT_NOT_FOUND` | Product not found for given application id | | `AUTHENTICATION_FAILED` | Authentication failed | | `UNAUTHORIZED` | Unauthorized | | `UNEXPECTED_ERROR` | Unexpected error with our service | | `VALIDATION_FAILED` | Invalid request data | | `INVALID_DATA` | The data provided has an invalid format | | `MISSING_PRODUCT_PERMISSION` | Missing product permission. | | `PAYMENT_ALREADY_EXISTS` | Payment already exists. | | `PAYMENT_NOT_FOUND` | Payment not found | | `PRODUCT_DISABLED` | Product is not enabled. | | `PROFILE_NOT_FOUND` | Profile not found. | | `PAYMENT_ALREADY_RETURNED` | The payment has already been returned | | `INVALID_PAYMENT_VALUE` | Payment value is not valid |

schema.description: Describes the properties of pix payment.

document_payment_initiator.description:
The CNPJ of the payment initiator institution.

* This field is required when the kind property to be equal PAYMENT_TRANSACTION_SERVICE.

kind.description: The type of mechanism used to start the payment

payment_priority.description:
The property indicate if the liquidation is priority or not.

* `IMMEDIATE`: Must be used when the payer user request the send immediate payment.
* `SCHEDULED`: Must be used when the payer user do a scheduled payment.

type_payment_priority.description: Indicate if this is a priority transaction or not.

agent_modality.description:
The agent modality of the withdraw.

* When the goal to be equal `CHANGE` or `WITHDRAW` this field is required.
* When the goal to be equal `BUY_OR_TRANSFER` you don't inform this field.

withdraw_ispb.description:
Withdrawal service provider ISBP.

* When the goal to be equal `CHANGE` or `WITHDRAW` this property is required.
* When the goal to be equal BUY_OR_TRANSFER you don't inform this field.

value_details.description:
The element group used to break down payment amounts

* If the goal to be equal `BUY_OR_TRANSFER` don't inform this field.
* If the goal to be equal `CHANGE` is mandatory inform two different
groups, one with the kind equal to `PURCHASE_AMOUNT` and another with
the kind equal to `AVAILABLE_CASH`.
* If the goal to be equal `WITHDRAW` is mandatory inform one group with
the kind equal to `AVAILABLE_CASH`.

kind.description:
The value kind.

* `PURCHASE_AMOUNT`: The purchase amount
* `AVAILABLE_CASH`: Value of the resource in kind provided.

value.description: The purchase value or the value of the resource in kind provided

key.description:
Key to identify the transactional account

* Don't provide this field when kind to be equal `MANUAL`.

conciliation_id.description:
Recipient conciliation identifier.

* When the kind to be equal `DYNAMIC_QRCODE`, `PAYER_QRCODE` or `PAYMENT_TRANSACTION_SERVICE` this field is mandatory.
* When the kind to be equal `STATIC_QRCODE` this field is optional.
* When the kind to be equal `MANUAL` OR 'KEY' don't inform this field.

end_to_end_id.description:
The payment's end to end id.

Required when kind is equal to KEY, DYNAMIC_QRCODE, STATIC_QRCODE or PAYER_QRCODE

anti_fraud_status.description:
The property indicates details about the anti-fraud analysis.

* `WITH_SUSPECT`: Anti-fraud engine has detected suspicion.
* `WITHOUT_SUSPECT`: Anti-fraud engine has not detected suspicion.

status.description:
The property indicates the status of the payment and should only be informed if the payment is `REJECTED` at its origin.

* `REJECTED`: Should create the payment as rejected

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Base64 filter to bring only accounts after the provided value

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Base64 filter to bring only accounts before the provided value

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The numbers of accounts to return. Can be omitted if provided before or after filters with limit embedded in them. If nothing is provided, the default will be 1000 as limit
